metadata.title: CVE-2023-52433 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_set_rbtree: skip sync GC for new elements in thistransactionNew elements in this transaction might expired before such transactionends. Skip sync GC for such elements otherwise commit path might walkover an already released object. Once transaction is finished, async GCwill collect such expired element.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
